document.title: Georgia Standards of Excellence CTEA Marketing

01B371F88F644694B7DD4B0808EF194C.description: Compare and summarize the benefits of using computerized systems to track and process orders at the manufacturing, wholesaling, or market center levels of distribution.

B6CBD9F5DCD3457F85365ECC91FE9D27.description: Explain how the selection of distribution channels affect the cost and retail price of merchandise.

0E6961A328694E5F97085336A7227A69.description: Outline the decisions to be made in managing the marketing functions of transportation and storage from the manufacturers' and the wholesalers' perspectives.

F2BF55F4E3A14023B926EBADC3A9DB8F.description: Contrast common buying and shipping terms used by a manufacturer and a wholesaler.

39110A6E20CA46219EBA154877D5DA5B.description: Outline the effect of bypassing retail stores and shipping directly from the manufacturer to an outlet center.

E60E9CB4CA364F3E92105CBA729B74ED.description: Describe the factors a manufacturer considers when selecting a distribution channel for a given line of merchandise.

C3CD144A64D84C44B2F5156C39E58A88.description: Explain the nature of channel-member relationships.

9482B016D01643F49775282F2554C884.description: Explain legal considerations in channel management.

14A021A817664A54BF43858E55B8AE36.description: Analyze the importance of utilizing an efficient distribution system.

EF4368C2101A4D5A8D89C4CC76F59A75.description: Construct an interior display and a window display.

2F1E59E66EAF47E1B3FF84E73B2DE1FB.description: Contrast merchandising techniques and store layouts used by various types of retailers such as boutiques, department stores, big box stores, and discounters/jobbers.

CFF3F59AA8564D39B52E0FE93E053229.description: Explain the use of technology in visual merchandising.

BBEF86D1F86D40D48671D9C832C5CF2E.description: Identify elements that influence store layouts.

3E44650C9C40458EA7C99723CBBB97FD.description: Evaluate the cost of advertising for a specific medium.

365E18233541498FBEB2D9425FA503F8.description: Design a promotional plan for a special event focused on a target market.

D3F6C406665E4B759F8CB2F7A4F63DC7.description: Prepare a promotional calendar of events for a given line of merchandise.

14EE6B83743C4EF5966D0700547C612F.description: Describe the use of business ethics in promotion.

75C45C7FC90B43A7B75E95E95C0EDE39.description: Explain the importance of visual merchandising to consumer behavior and business profits.

400729CD5AF74F4A9135BF8D074312E8.description: Explain how public relations are used to support promotional campaigns.

BD27CFDB6DD74D3683AA16A35F8EC95B.description: Discuss the different types of electronic media related to fashion/retail marketing (e.g., online media and specialty media such as iPods).

2B718416C8994724A47758EBA484D436.description: Describe the different types of broadcast media used in fashion/retail marketing (e.g., television and radio).

E6B155B8437D4378A03C87709637438D.description: Discuss the differences in product promotion at the national and local level.

EB4E1290C11A49068FE5A7FD6DE5855F.description: Determine how the various types of promotion are used in the fashion/retail industry.

1074395A2B09485297688A4AC1F7C4CD.description: Evaluate and explain the effects of promotion in the fashion/retail industry by developing visual merchandising presentations and promotional plans.

3C3365F7FA904AE284E00E44F4A29903.description: Describe the nature of selling regulations.

4EDB20AADD704F949ED6FEF7E94900EC.description: Understand the concepts and actions needed to determine client needs and wants and respond through planned, personalized communication that influences purchase decisions and enhances future business opportunities.

4313B34BEC034824B47ACC9359704DED.description: Identify consumer protection provisions and roles of appropriate agencies.

F2F75843FBD84AFC8F0B7F126175617B.description: Explain business ethics in product/service management.

FD9AEE7E77B44606830E1CE2443ADF51.description: Differentiate between private and designer labels and outline the advantages and disadvantages to a retailer in carrying the different labels.

8182FD480D7B41A09330484AFCAAFBCC.description: Identify and discuss the importance of selecting styles for different body types.

0DDECE2EE62B436EBAD4BE3B4E1D053B.description: Identify and classify sizes, styles, and characteristics of women's, men's, and children's fashions.

2544C194C4FF44D0B96C8B16C7B5116A.description: Describe buying strategies based on a target market.

77EA32C23BFD4C079F671588F24D815E.description: Differentiate between assortment planning and product mix.

480CCFA0A6FD4143AFFE431A258C8969.description: Describe the product selection process for fashion/retail buying.

18715E40961A450B9D1C25837AA705D4.description: Outline the impact of computer technology on tracking and maintaining inventory.

7D3C7774C3AD4F19B6A62D306228CD36.description: Describe the impact of mispricing, internal shortage, and external shortage on profits.

F72DAA6D78FB4B8B872EAAEBAD62806B.description: Calculate markups, markdowns, and types of discounts.

E28D258C28C548F790FE7350A441235B.description: Identify methods of stock planning and explain the importance of stock turnover ratio.

0DA02A9A4EC042BA91976D4317346600.description: Describe the extent to which inventory control impacts profits.

4A518145B9A74CBF800071D38E21117C.description: Examine the impact of internal and external shortage/shrinkage.

C11D900231B340B4819AE8779FEEFC4C.description: Describe the importance of inventory control.

0AAD62D213AA45F285CF6B9800EE4B3A.description: Implement an inventory management plan and compute product pricing utilizing cost control methods.

50C64145F0F247A4809087CBBD2949E6.description: Assess appropriateness of marketing research for the problem/issue (e.g., research methods, sources of information, timeliness of information).

EE48D8D9F8CD4E299466DC5017F72D86.description: Evaluate questionnaire design (e.g., types of questions, question wording, routing, sequencing, length and layout).

5E3AB806B97B41CD83455E4089078314.description: Identify sources of error in a research project (e.g., response errors, interviewer errors, non-response errors, sample design).

1E962489E27D45D7B10B885825EB671F.description: Explain the use of descriptive statistics in marketing decision making.

1068742809AA47B9B0B7493531A20DA2.description: Explain the use of diaries (e.g., product, media-use, contact).

1F96AC36A3F546688E0B5D2327C98688.description: Describe types of rating scales (including Likert scales, semantic differential scales, behavior intention scales, etc.).

65AEF72B2204493FAE54F43DAEE6AC88.description: Discuss the nature of sampling plans (e.g., who, how many, how chosen).

711384BE221643C4B818C09B75FC148A.description: Describe methods used to design marketing research studies (e.g., descriptive, exploratory, and causal).

ECF03CC045B2436A814C99995C18E5FD.description: Discuss the nature of marketing research problems/issues.

EE84F9C95E8F4FF59BFE6AEC63E81D33.description: Describe the regulation of marketing-information management.

AFD8CDC4320547C0AB2CF4778A10A651.description: Understand the concepts, systems, and tools needed to gather, access, synthesize, evaluate, and disseminate information for use in making business decisions.

9E71D2142C42494AB7475A028EA2C762.description: Prepare a buying plan and calculate "open-to-buy" on cost and retail for selected products in an identified business.

F18C95EB43304658B23D3BD70A4A1D29.description: Determine how to maintain the appropriate level and mix of merchandise by employing the concept of "open-to-buy."

146BFE4275594BC8B0E51D57B7116F9A.description: Explain the components of the merchandise plan.

C296732E716B49CBBCDD29A266F28E38.description: Calculate gross profit and net profit.

752E42453E4B471EB7A120FFE87C13AA.description: Differentiate between cost and retail when determining prices for merchandise.

28305C2F67D04710AB0DE1B59B35E7D5.description: Determine factors to consider when developing a merchandise plan and budget for a business.

4714430B5E3E45D48BF0111A55C19B50.description: Explain competition as it relates to fashion designers, manufacturers, and retailers in the marketplace.

E0F685860E13419FA70A35AD80C027B5.description: Contrast typical profit margins of manufacturers, wholesalers, and retailers in the fashion/retail industry.

AEA628B1290346459C1CF5094CAD6820.description: Describe the impact of such economic indicators as consumer discretionary income, inflation, gross domestic product, and productivity on consumer spending on fashion and other retail products and services.

36947264B4BF4FA9886D551CE0219EEE.description: Describe current economic trends in the United States and outline the influence of the trends on decision-making in fashion/retail merchandising.

427D6D3A78C64F6399C562B695ADF72E.description: Compare and contrast the concept of economic resources versus economic goods/services.

5D9C4CB80F59409A8759E2BA7C45B967.description: Analyze economics in the fashion industry.

5D30A06EA5C2437ABAB26460AF9C4F20.description: Describe key industry groups and the role each group plays in the fashion ecosystem.

2DFBFAA19AA945D58F38B160924C83FD.description: Describe laws that regulate the fashion industry (e.g., the Federal Trade Commission, price fixing, and the Sherman Antitrust Act).

80AD354F4F364592B26925FA7DFD5C1B.description: Describe laws that protect consumers (e.g., product labeling and product safety).

9FFF80567F9D4A1CBB3EC9588315CC75.description: Identify major laws that regulate and/or impact the fashion/retail industry.

A74CAB0AD7994DE2B2F27771F6F98EC8.description: Analyze the components of an order placed at a market center.

E89EEFFE83184FEE95EBEA2E93BD3D4E.description: Summarize buyers' strategies for merchandise selection.

04714EF1B1CE4C308B2D678586C6F845.description: Describe critical components of effective buyer-vendor relationships.

FB583078A24840C6BD0D551F3457B5DC.description: Describe the responsibilities of a retail buyer at a market center.

57E237F163CB4D8A91A831264B8E5EEF.description: Explain the sales process at market centers.

57528187E49946C9A54B4D099B00A690.description: Compare the advantages and disadvantages of using different buying venues such as trade shows, showrooms, and sales representatives.

A2FA2EFB5D924FAC8E3183F88951F820.description: Explain the role of fashion market centers and identify international fashion market centers.

A9C88B5A62654525BB39EC938243242E.description: Differentiate various market centers and relate their importance to merchandising decisions.

E6816AA8C0284062A4547EBA8122D91D.description: Explain factors that impact the length of each stage within the fashion cycle.

9B1AAE9033784D999A95D63DDC2FFAE6.description: Compare the stages of the fashion cycle using current fashion and fashions from the past.

DC7EC2D118A6430DBDF943F38686857F.description: Explain the process of fashion forecasting and the advantages of forecasting to the industry.

AB734CEEB49747D0BE9E74EF142DF1B8.description: Review the evolution and movement of fashion.

729885355DA84BB5AD6AF1B8197EAB2D.description: Present a professional image through appearance, behavior and language.

F7A8BD7C765C4F3D95B79C219E4DAA03.description: Apply the appropriate skill sets to be productive in a changing, technological, diverse workplace to be able to work independently and apply team work skills.

5DC502A8FB9845ED82CD5052CFB3F9CF.description: Model work readiness traits required for success in the workplace including integrity, honesty, accountability, punctuality, time management, and respect for diversity.

35A0F209DE734739A46AE0019144BEDA.description: Exhibit critical thinking and problem solving skills to locate, analyze and apply information in career planning and employment situations.

B537B09415E7464D90F1E631A806555C.description: Demonstrate creativity by asking challenging questions and applying innovative procedures and methods.

54C8A0E4A31C478A82AD091F256178D0.description: Communicate effectively through writing, speaking, listening, reading, and interpersonal abilities.

3F50D67B504748378CBA29D0143ABF20.description: Demonstrate employability skills required by business and industry.
